entry.title: Tuesday night: Flurries. Low minus 11.
entry.summary: Mainly cloudy. 30 percent chance of flurries this evening. Flurries beginning near midnight. Local amount 2 cm. Wind becoming west 20 km/h overnight. Low minus 11. Wind chill minus 11 this evening and minus 18 overnight. Forecast issued 7:07 PM EST Tuesday 31 January 2023

entry.title: Wednesday: Flurries. High minus 3.
entry.summary: Flurries. Wind west 30 km/h gusting to 50. High minus 3. Wind chill minus 21 in the morning and minus 9 in the afternoon. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 7:07 PM EST Tuesday 31 January 2023

entry.title: Wednesday night: Chance of flurries. Low minus 9. POP 40%
